name: hermes
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in Greek mythology (= ancient stories), the messenger of the gods, and the god of trade, thieves, travellers, and sport: The moon is most frequently the symbol of the god Hermes or Thoth.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen the Romans conquered Greece, they adopted the god Hermes.The ceremony was held to honor the god Hermes.The best all-round shopping street is Ermou, aptly named for Hermes, the god of commerce.The ram was sent by the god Hermes to rescue Phrixus and Helle.
